pages.title: Novilunium Manatite
pages.text: A Manatite attuned to Darkness with Runes of Darkness.$(br)A Ring forged with this Manatite will grant the wearer invisibility; can also grant the user perfect vision in pure darkness. When used in a staff the caster can mask the presence of its allies and enhance their senses. Mobs in a radius will become visible to anyone.

pages.title: Novilunium Staffs
pages.text: Duration, Power and Range of the effects depend on the tier of the staff.$(br)Wooden is the worst. Silver has good range, but weaker effects and moderate cooldown. Gold has abysmal range, but powerful effects with a long cooldown. Archmage is the best.
